snippet: A man with dual German-Lebanese citizenship has been charged with spying for the Syrian intelligence service from 2007 until his arrest in February, the federal prosecutor’s office said Friday.
abstract: German prosecutors accuse man identified only as Mahmoud El A of spying on Syrian opposition members living in Germany from 2007 until his arrest in February 2012.
lead_paragraph: A man with dual German-Lebanese citizenship has been charged with spying for the Syrian intelligence service from 2007 until his arrest in February, the federal prosecutor’s office said Friday.

headline.main: Germany: Man Charged as Spy for Syria
headline.print_headline: Germany: Man Charged as Spy for Syria
